summary: Frontend Order Intake Testing Complete - All features verified. Service Catalogue page loads with 23 services, search/filter/sort working. Order flow (3-step: Your Details → Service Details → Review & Pay) working correctly. Order creation persists to database.
critical_code_review_comments: ServiceOrderPage.js implements 3-step order flow with proper validation
OrderSuccessPage.js displays order confirmation with order_id from URL params
Backend public.py and public_services.py correctly return database-driven services
Order creation endpoint POST /api/orders/create working correctly
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing

test_credentials.note: No auth required for public pages

seed_data_creation: Test orders created during testing with prefix TEST_
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend Order Intake complete. ServicesCataloguePage at /services/catalogue shows 23 services. ServiceOrderPage at /order/:serviceCode implements 3-step order flow. OrderSuccessPage at /order-success shows confirmation. Test service codes: TENANT_REF (£35), RENT_REVIEW (£79), EPC_CONSULT (£99).

service_catalogue_page_loads.details: Page loads at /services/catalogue with all 23 services

search_functionality.details: Search filters services correctly (e.g., 'Tenant' shows 1 result)

category_filter.details: Category filter works (Document Packs, Standalone Reports, etc.)

sort_functionality.details: Sort by Name (A-Z), Price (Low to High), Price (High to Low) working

service_cards_display.details: Cards show price, documents count, delivery time, Order Now button

order_page_3_step_progress.details: Progress indicator shows Your Details → Service Details → Review & Pay

service_summary_card.details: Order page displays service name, description, price with VAT

customer_details_form_validation.details: Required fields (name, email) validated before proceeding

intake_form_displays_service_fields.details: Service-specific intake fields displayed (e.g., TENANT_REF has 6 fields)

review_step_summary.details: Review step shows customer details, intake data, documents, pricing

order_success_page.details: OrderSuccessPage displays order confirmation with order_id

mocked_apis.note: Stripe checkout is integrated but uses test mode (sk_test_emergent)
